name: Sweet and Sour Escabeche
description: Indulge in a high-protein, low-carb treat with our Sweet and Sour Escabeche recipe. Tailored for health-conscious individuals, this dish blends the delightful flavors of spiced natural coconut vinegar and coconut sugar with fresh raw ingredients. It's a perfect example of a healthyfied dish that doesn't compromise on taste while adhering to dietary choices that favor low sugar and controlled sodium intake.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the raw fish under cold water and pat dry with paper towels.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the red onion, mince the garlic, and grate the ginger root.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Season the fish with salt and ground black pepper on both sides.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a pan over medium heat and cook the fish until golden brown on each side, about 5-6 minutes per side.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the fish from the pan and set aside. In the same pan, sauté the sliced onion, minced garlic, and grated ginger until softened.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Add the spiced natural coconut vinegar and coconut sugar to the pan, stirring well to combine with the sautéed vegetables.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Return the fish to the pan, spooning the sauce over it to coat evenly. Let simmer for an additional 5 minutes, allowing the fish to absorb the flavors of the sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
